pinnedRepos.name: OmniDoc-AI
pinnedRepos.description: AI-powered assistant for summarizing, querying, and challenge me mode, research and legal documents using multi-provider LLMs and hybrid retrieval.

pinnedRepos.name: rag-chatbot
pinnedRepos.description: Flask chatbot for querying uploaded PDFs via retrieval-augmented generation. Runs any GGUF model locally with llama.cpp—no external tools like Ollama or LM Studio required. Supports multi-model responses and session history.

pinnedRepos.name: MathematicalUniverseExplorer
pinnedRepos.description: Visualize 3D mathematical functions with an interactive Tkinter GUI. Powered by Matplotlib and NumPy for real-time surface rendering and custom expressions. An extended version of Desmos

pinnedRepos.name: Cosmic-Observer
pinnedRepos.description: Interactive Flask app for exploring space weather, aurora visibility, and exoplanets using real-time data from NASA and NOAA. Built with Plotly, Pandas, and Geopy.

pinnedRepos.name: Open-Source-Licence-Wizard
pinnedRepos.description: A Streamlit app that helps you choose the best open-source license for your project based on your preferences. Provides recommendations with key features.

pinnedRepos.name: scoreFi
pinnedRepos.description: Machine learning pipeline to score DeFi wallets (0–1000) based on Aave V2 interactions. Includes feature engineering, Sybil detection, and behavioral analysis to support trust-driven lending and wallet segmentation.

otherRepos.name: SaaSquatch-Intelligence-Hub
otherRepos.description: AI-powered lead scoring & prioritization tool for SaaSquatch Leads. Analyzes leads across 5 dimensions, automatically tiers A/B/C/D, and provides actionable buying signals. Built with React + Tailwind CSS.

otherRepos.name: hmblecreator.github.io
otherRepos.description: Personal website built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS to showcase projects, thoughts, and digital experiments. A telescope into my world of computational creativity, elegant equations, and tech-driven insights.

otherRepos.name: Game
otherRepos.description: Fruit Frenzy was my first fun project—a quirky Tkinter-based guessing game where players chase points by randomly drawing fruits or veggies. It includes score tracking, turn-based logic, and a personalized greeting system. A lighthearted way to explore GUIs, randomness, and interactive design in Python.

otherRepos.name: Luxury_Products_Apparel_Recommendation_Engine
otherRepos.description: A content-based fashion recommender system built in Python and Jupyter Notebook. It analyzes user-preferred item features to suggest similar luxury apparel products from a curated dataset. Highlights include data preprocessing, feature extraction, and cosine similarity for personalized results.

otherRepos.name: Text-Statistics-Counter
otherRepos.description: Text Statistics Counter is a Python app built with PyQt6 for real-time document analysis. It tracks word and character count, estimates pages based on user-defined settings, and offers text export. Lightweight and intuitive, it's perfect for writers and editors needing fast, customizable feedback.

otherRepos.name: ICA
otherRepos.description: Intelligent Code Assistant (ICA)  A multi-language code summarizer built with Python and CustomTkinter. It analyzes class structures, functions, and imports across various languages, and generates clear natural language summaries through a clean, syntax-highlighted GUI.  Ideal for devs

otherRepos.name: OS_Project
otherRepos.description: Python-powered system utility with a sleek CustomTkinter interface. Monitor processes, analyze performance, optimize resources, and get detailed system info—all in one place. Ideal for OS enthusiasts and productivity tweakers.

otherRepos.name: QuantumWaveFunctionSimulator
otherRepos.description: An interactive, full-stack web app for visualizing quantum systems in 1D & 2D. Solves Schrödinger equations, simulates quantum dynamics, and supports custom potentials with real-time plotting—all built with FastAPI, React, and Plotly.js..

otherRepos.name: space-debris-tracker
otherRepos.description: Tracks orbital debris using satellite data and ML models to analyze space object motion and collision risks. Built with Python backend and interactive frontend.

otherRepos.name: Lunar-Surface-Feature-Classification-
otherRepos.description: This project presents a comprehensive image classification pipeline designed to  analyze and classify images from the Artificial Lunar Rocky Landscape Dataset. The  goal is to improve accuracy and generalization using state-of-the-art deep learning  architectures, data augmentation techniques, and robust evaluation strategies.

otherRepos.name: DevFlow-Reflector
otherRepos.description: DevFlow Reflector is a developer productivity tool that visualizes your Git history and lets you track your coding journey through integrated journaling. It transforms raw commit logs into dynamic analytics and insights—helping you understand your work patterns and improve your workflow. Designed as a minimal MVP with future plans for Extensions.

repo.description: A FOSS toolkit to detect, explain, and mitigate bias in AI/ML models and datasets. Built for developers and researchers committed to ethical AI practices.

DevFlow Reflector is a developer productivity tool that visualizes your Git history and lets you track your coding journey through integrated journaling. It transforms raw commit logs into dynamic analytics and insights—helping you understand your work patterns and improve your workflow. Designed as a minimal MVP with future plans for Extensions.
Document intelligence framework for Python - Extract text, metadata, and structured data   from PDFs, images, Office documents, and more. Built on Pandoc, PDFium, and Tesseract.
🚧 SDK for building verifiable AI Agents on Flare using Confidential Space
OpenAI-sublime-text package core package implemented in rust
Replace 'hub' with 'ingest' in any GitHub URL to get a prompt-friendly extract of a codebase
5ire is a cross-platform desktop AI assistant, MCP client. It compatible with major service providers,  supports local knowledge base and  tools via model context protocol servers .
A GraphQL library for Python that leverages type annotations 🍓
